mapper.insert: insert into dinner(userId,titel, price, maximum, startTime, endTime, categoryId, label, address, thumbnail, details) values (#{user.id},#{titel},#{price},#{maximum},#{startTime},#{endTime},#{category.id},#{label},#{address},#{thumbnail},#{details})

insert into photos (dinnerId, src, createTime) values
(#{item.dinner.id}, #{item.src}, #{item.createTime})
mapper.select: select d.id did, titel,price,maximum,startTime,endTime,label,address,thumbnail,details,enrolment,interest,d.status dstatus, u.*, a.id aid, a.name aname, a.parentId pid, c.id cid,c.name cname,c.type,c.status cstatus from dinner d,users u,areas a,category c where d.categoryId=c.id and d.userId=u.id and u.areaId=a.id and u.id=#{id} order by d.id desc

select d.id did, titel,price,maximum,startTime,endTime,label,address,thumbnail,details,enrolment,interest,d.status dstatus, u.*, a.id aid, a.name aname, a.parentId pid, c.id cid,c.name cname,c.type,c.status cstatus from dinner d,users u,areas a,category c where d.categoryId=c.id and d.userId=u.id and u.areaId=a.id and d.id=#{id} order by d.id desc
mapper.update: update dinner set interest=#{interest} where id=#{id}
update dinner set enrolment=#{enrolment} where id=#{id}
